duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage an average caseload of 25-35 Grant Subawards, performing responsible, varied, and complex technical analytical assignments.
Work under the direction of the Law Enforcement & County Victim Services Unit Chief.
Manage Grant Subawards and perform technical analytical assignments.
Work in a challenging opportunity in a team-oriented environment.
Implement Cal OES grants management policies.

education_certification.credential: Completion of Form 700 within 30 days of appointment.
Experience working with grants and Microsoft Office applications.
Ability to make sound decisions and follow through on commitments.
